SELECT a.employeeId, a.employeeName, a.employeeNo, a.workDepID, b.depName workDepName, a.genderCode, (CASE WHEN a.genderCode = 1 THEN '男' WHEN a.genderCode = 2 THEN '女' END) genderCodeValue FROM fw_employee a, fw_department b
a.isPost ='是' and a.workDepID = b.depId
and ( instr(b.depName,#{employeeName}) >0 or instr(a.employeeName,#{employeeName}) >0)
order by workDepID desc,employeeName
